definition: spirit wall (screen wall used to shield an entrance in traditional Chinese architecture)

sentences.english: Detouring the only obstruction, shadow wall, it is courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 只有一墙之隔，转过影壁，就是院子。

sentences.english: Finally, the screen wall and entrance of the reference transmission has been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 最后对影壁和玄关的借鉴传承关系作了简要分析。

sentences.english: Screen wall as the traditional architecture of the building, a long time.
sentences.chinese: 影壁作为传统建筑中的构建，由来已久。

definition: a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
area above the lintel of a doorway
wooden or stone block supporting the axle of a door
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
